name.description: The filename template for the target file(s) (https://github.com/webpack-contrib/file-loader#name).

outputPath.description: A filesystem path where the target file(s) will be placed (https://github.com/webpack-contrib/file-loader#outputpath).

publicPath.description: A custom public path for the target file(s) (https://github.com/webpack-contrib/file-loader#publicpath).

regExp.description: A Regular Expression to one or many parts of the target file path. The capture groups can be reused in the name property using [N] placeholder (https://github.com/webpack-contrib/file-loader#regexp).
